verses.text_plain: Moreover he made an altar of brass, twenty cubits the length thereof, and twenty cubits the breadth thereof, and ten cubits the height thereof.
verses.verse_html: 1Moreover he made an altar of brass, twenty cubits the length thereof, and twenty cubits the breadth thereof, and ten cubits the height thereof.

verses.text_plain: Also he made a molten sea of ten cubits from brim to brim, round in compass, and five cubits the height thereof; and a line of thirty cubits did compass it round about.
verses.verse_html:
2Also he made a molten sea of ten cubits from brim to brim, round in compass, and five cubits the height thereof; and a line of thirty cubits did compass it round about. ▼
▼ from…: Heb. from his brim to his brim

footnotes.body_text: ▼ from…: Heb. from his brim to his brim
footnotes.body_html: ▼ from…: Heb. from his brim to his brim

verses.text_plain: And under it was the similitude of oxen, which did compass it round about: ten in a cubit, compassing the sea round about. Two rows of oxen were cast, when it was cast.
verses.verse_html: 3And under it was the similitude of oxen, which did compass it round about: ten in a cubit, compassing the sea round about. Two rows of oxen were cast, when it was cast.

verses.text_plain: It stood upon twelve oxen, three looking toward the north, and three looking toward the west, and three looking toward the south, and three looking toward the east: and the sea was set above upon them, and all their hinder parts were inward.
verses.verse_html: 4It stood upon twelve oxen, three looking toward the north, and three looking toward the west, and three looking toward the south, and three looking toward the east: and the sea was set above upon them, and all their hinder parts were inward.

tokens.text: upon them, and all their hinder parts

verses.text_plain: And the thickness of it was an handbreadth, and the brim of it like the work of the brim of a cup, with flowers of lilies; and it received and held three thousand baths.
verses.verse_html:
5And the thickness of it was an handbreadth, and the brim of it like the work of the brim of a cup, with flowers of lilies; and it received and held three thousand baths. ▼
▼ with flowers…: or, like a lilyflower

footnotes.body_text: ▼ with flowers…: or, like a lilyflower
footnotes.body_html: ▼ with flowers…: or, like a lilyflower

verses.text_plain: He made also ten lavers, and put five on the right hand, and five on the left, to wash in them: such things as they offered for the burnt offering they washed in them; but the sea was for the priests to wash in.
verses.verse_html:
6He made also ten lavers, and put five on the right hand, and five on the left, to wash in them: such things as they offered for the burnt offering they washed in them; but the sea was for the priests to wash in. ▼
▼ such…: Heb. the work of burnt offering

tokens.text: in them: such things as they offered

footnotes.body_text: ▼ such…: Heb. the work of burnt offering
footnotes.body_html: ▼ such…: Heb. the work of burnt offering

verses.text_plain: And he made ten candlesticks of gold according to their form, and set them in the temple, five on the right hand, and five on the left.
verses.verse_html: 7And he made ten candlesticks of gold according to their form, and set them in the temple, five on the right hand, and five on the left.

verses.text_plain: He made also ten tables, and placed them in the temple, five on the right side, and five on the left. And he made an hundred basons of gold.
verses.verse_html:
8He made also ten tables, and placed them in the temple, five on the right side, and five on the left. And he made an hundred basons of gold. ▼
▼ basons: or, bowls

verses.text_plain: Furthermore he made the court of the priests, and the great court, and doors for the court, and overlaid the doors of them with brass.
verses.verse_html: 9Furthermore he made the court of the priests, and the great court, and doors for the court, and overlaid the doors of them with brass.

verses.text_plain: And he set the sea on the right side of the east end, over against the south.
verses.verse_html: 10And he set the sea on the right side of the east end, over against the south.

verses.text_plain: And Huram made the pots, and the shovels, and the basons. And Huram finished the work that he was to make for king Solomon for the house of God;
verses.verse_html:
11And Huram made the pots, and the shovels, and the basons. And Huram finished the work that he was to make for king Solomon for the house of God; ▼
▼ basons: or, bowls
 , ▼
▼ finished: Heb. finished to make

footnotes.body_html: ▼ finished: Heb. finished to make

verses.text_plain: To wit, the two pillars, and the pommels, and the chapiters which were on the top of the two pillars, and the two wreaths to cover the two pommels of the chapiters which were on the top of the pillars;
verses.verse_html: 12To wit, the two pillars, and the pommels, and the chapiters which were on the top of the two pillars, and the two wreaths to cover the two pommels of the chapiters which were on the top of the pillars;

verses.text_plain: And four hundred pomegranates on the two wreaths; two rows of pomegranates on each wreath, to cover the two pommels of the chapiters which were upon the pillars.
verses.verse_html:
13And four hundred pomegranates on the two wreaths; two rows of pomegranates on each wreath, to cover the two pommels of the chapiters which were upon the pillars. ▼
▼ upon: Heb. upon the face of

footnotes.body_text: ▼ upon: Heb. upon the face of
footnotes.body_html: ▼ upon: Heb. upon the face of

verses.text_plain: He made also bases, and lavers made he upon the bases;
verses.verse_html:
14He made also bases, and lavers made he upon the bases; ▼
▼ lavers: or, caldrons

verses.text_plain: One sea, and twelve oxen under it.
verses.verse_html: 15One sea, and twelve oxen under it.

verses.text_plain: The pots also, and the shovels, and the fleshhooks, and all their instruments, did Huram his father make to king Solomon for the house of the Lord of bright brass.
verses.verse_html:
16The pots also, and the shovels, and the fleshhooks, and all their instruments, did Huram his father make to king Solomon for the house of the Lord of bright brass. ▼
▼ bright: Heb. made bright, or, scoured

footnotes.body_text: ▼ bright: Heb. made bright, or, scoured
footnotes.body_html: ▼ bright: Heb. made bright, or, scoured

verses.text_plain: In the plain of Jordan did the king cast them, in the clay ground between Succoth and Zeredathah.
verses.verse_html:
17In the plain of Jordan did the king cast them, in the clay ground between Succoth and Zeredathah. ▼
▼ clay…: Heb. thicknesses of the ground

footnotes.body_text: ▼ clay…: Heb. thicknesses of the ground
footnotes.body_html: ▼ clay…: Heb. thicknesses of the ground

verses.text_plain: Thus Solomon made all these vessels in great abundance: for the weight of the brass could not be found out.
verses.verse_html: 18Thus Solomon made all these vessels in great abundance: for the weight of the brass could not be found out.

verses.text_plain: And Solomon made all the vessels that were for the house of God, the golden altar also, and the tables whereon the shewbread was set;
verses.verse_html: 19And Solomon made all the vessels that were for the house of God, the golden altar also, and the tables whereon the shewbread was set;

verses.text_plain: Moreover the candlesticks with their lamps, that they should burn after the manner before the oracle, of pure gold;
verses.verse_html: 20Moreover the candlesticks with their lamps, that they should burn after the manner before the oracle, of pure gold;

verses.text_plain: And the flowers, and the lamps, and the tongs, made he of gold, and that perfect gold;
verses.verse_html:
21And the flowers, and the lamps, and the tongs, made he of gold, and that perfect gold; ▼
▼ perfect…: Heb. perfections of gold

footnotes.body_html: ▼ perfect…: Heb. perfections of gold

verses.text_plain: And the snuffers, and the basons, and the spoons, and the censers, of pure gold: and the entry of the house, the inner doors thereof for the most holy place, and the doors of the house of the temple, were of gold.
verses.verse_html:
22And the snuffers, and the basons, and the spoons, and the censers, of pure gold: and the entry of the house, the inner doors thereof for the most holy place, and the doors of the house of the temple, were of gold. ▼
▼ basons: or, bowls
